proxy_ips.alert.address_map_create.succe: Successfully created an address map with the following id: %{id}
proxy_ips.error.get_address_maps_failed: There was an error fetching address maps
proxy_ips.address_map_table.domains.tool: ...and %{smart_count} additional domain configured.||||...and %{smart_count} additional domains configured
proxy_ips.address_map_table.ip_addresses: ...and %{smart_count} additional IP address configured.||||...and %{smart_count} additional IP addresses configured
proxy_ips.homepage.title: Address Maps
proxy_ips.homepage.description: Return custom IPs, or static Cloudflare IPs, in requests for proxied hostnames.
proxy_ips.homepage.address_map_card.desc: If you customize the IPs Cloudflare uses, by leasing static Cloudflare IPs or bringing your own IPs (BYOIP), use Address Maps to specify which IPs to return for which hostnames. Static IPs are bound to their Cloudflare-created address map which you can edit, but you cannot create other maps with your static IPs.
proxy_ips.create_address_map_page.title: Create an Address Map
proxy_ips.add_domains_step.scope_field.z: Map only applies to the zones/domains specified below.
proxy_ips.add_domains_step.scope_field.a: Map applies to all zones/domains in this account (%{accountName}).
proxy_ips.add_ip_addresses_step.add_ip_f: List the IPv4 or IPv6 records you want associated with this map.
proxy_ips.add_ip_addresses_step.referenc: Here are the available BYOIP prefixes that are onboarded to this account. Contact your account manager if a range is missing.
proxy_ips.add_ip_addresses_step.error_me: The following IP addresses are invalid or are static IPs (to map static IPs, go back to your list of maps and edit the Cloudflare-created static IP map):
proxy_ips.add_ip_addresses_step.help_mes: Separate IP address entries with a new line.
proxy_ips.create_address_map_page.add_de: Add a name for this map (optional)
proxy_ips.review_step.description: Check your map configurations before deploying it. To make changes, press the "Previous" button
proxy_ips.review_address_map_page.title: Review Address Map
proxy_ips.review_address_map_page.descri: The following settings are attached to this Address Map.
proxy_ips.review_address_map_page.immuta: This address map was created by Cloudflare as the default address map using your BYOIP or static IP addresses. For BYOIP address maps, you can override it by creating a new Address Map. For static IP address maps, you can only edit the map and cannot create other maps with your static IPs.
proxy_ips.edit_address_map_page.title: Edit Address Map
proxy_ips.edit_address_map_page.descript: Configure domains and IP addresses for your address map.
proxy_ips.delete_modal.title: Delete Address Map
proxy_ips.delete_modal.description:
Deleting an Address Map cannot be undone and will likely change the IP addresses used for these zones. 

**Cloudflare recommends disabling an Address Map first, to avoid losing mapping information.**
proxy_ips.delete_modal.tooltip: You must disable this map in the status column before you can permanently delete it.
proxy_ips.cancel_modal.title: Discard Edits To Address Map
proxy_ips.cancel_modal.description:
You are about to revert changes to your address map. 

**Are you sure you want to proceed with discarding all of your changes?**
proxy_ips.enable_map_modal.title: Enable Address Map
proxy_ips.enable_map_modal.description: Enabling this Address Map will likely change the IP addresses used for these zones.
proxy_ips.disable_map_modal.title: Disable Address Map
proxy_ips.disable_map_modal.description: Disabling this Address Map will likely change the IP addresses used for these zones.
proxy_ips.links.create_address_map.label: Create new address map
leased_ips.title: Leased IPs
leased_ips.description: IP addresses you have reserved for use with specific products. Speak to a customer support specialist to lease additional addresses or remove current addresses from your account.
leased.ips_table.empty.title: No Leased IPs Yet
leased.ips_table.empty.description: Once you lease IP addresses for products like Magic Transit or CDN Static, theyâ€™ll appear here. Contact support to get started.
leased.ips_table.staticIpsForCdnIngressI: Static IPs for CDN Ingress IPv4
Static IPs for CDN Ingress IPv6
leased.ips_table.staticIpsForSpectrumIPv: Static IPs for Spectrum IPv4 - RIPE
Static IPs for Spectrum IPv6 - RIPE
ip_address_space.title: Address space
ip_address_space.description: Define and review your network prefixes within Cloudflare's global network. This includes both public IP addresses and internal private IP address ranges.
ip_address_space.custom_ips.title: Custom IP assignment
ip_address_space.custom_ips.description: Manage the private IP prefixes Cloudflare's internal services use to communicate with your private network.
ip_address_space.custom_ips.edit.title: Edit prefix details
ip_address_space.custom_ips.edit.descrip: This prefix is the Source IP for traffic entering your network. Do not use any existing Magic WAN destination prefix, or routing will fail.
ip_address_space.custom_ips.edit.error.s: The subnet overlaps with another subnet or route. Please review your network configuration and adjust the subnet to resolve the conflict.
ip_address_space.custom_ips.edit.error.i: Invalid subnet mask length. Please review your network configuration and adjust appropriately.
ip_address_space.custom_ips.edit.error: An unexpected error occurred. Please verify the entered prefix and try again.
byoip.ip_prefixes_table.description: Bring your own IP prefixes to Cloudflare and manage your service bindings across Cloudflare products.
byoip.ip_prefixes_table.your_prefixes.de: View and manage your IP prefixes.
byoip.add_prefix.title: Add a prefix
byoip.add_prefix.page_description: Specify the IP prefix you want to use with Cloudflare. After we validate ownership of your prefix, you can bind a Cloudflare service and edit the advertised status.
byoip.add_prefix.define_prefix.title: Define your prefix
byoip.add_prefix.define_prefix.descripti: Enter your IP prefix and a description to easily reference it. Note: When you add a prefix, you authorize Cloudflare to create LOAs on your behalf.
byoip.add_prefix.field.as_number_tooltip: The 16-bit or 32-bit integer representing the Autonomous System (AS) number associated with the client IP address.
byoip.add_prefix.validate_ownership.desc: Please use the following token ID to update your IRR or DNS record to validate that you are the owner of the IP address. Once entered, please give us up to 10 minutes to validate your IP. Once your prefix is validated, you can deploy the default service binding.
byoip.add_prefix.error.create_failed: Failed to create prefix. Please try again.
byoip.add_prefix.error.validation_failed: Failed to validate ownership. Please ensure you have updated your IRR or DNS record with the token.
byoip.add_prefix.error.invalid_cidr: Please enter a valid IP prefix in CIDR notation (e.g. 8.31.161.0/24)
byoip.add_prefix.error.invalid_asn: Please enter a valid AS number (e.g. 12036)
byoip.add_prefix.error.irr_validation: We could not validate your IP prefix due to an Internet Routing Registry (IRR) entry validation error. Confirm your IP prefix is correct, ensure your IRR entry is up to date, then try again. Learn more about <0>managing IRR entries</0> and <1>troubleshooting prefix validation in Docs</1>.
byoip.add_prefix.error.rpki_validation: We could not validate your IP prefix due to a Resource Public Key Infrastructure (RPKI) configuration validation error. Confirm your IP prefix is correct, ensure your Route Origin Authorizations (ROAs) are accurate, then try again. Learn more about <0>route filtering and RPKI</0> and <1>troubleshooting prefix validation in Docs</1>.
byoip.add_prefix.error.ownership_validat: We could not validate your IP prefix due to an ownership validation error. Confirm your IP prefix is correct, ensure your validation token is correct in all DNS TXT records or in the IRR record, then try again. Learn more about <0>validating prefix ownership</0> and <1>troubleshooting prefix validation in Docs</1>.
byoip.add_prefix.error.prefix_exists_for: A prefix with the same CIDR block already exists in your account or Cloudflare's system. You cannot create a duplicate prefix for the same IP range.
byoip.add_prefix.error.irr_entry_not_fou: Cloudflare could not find a valid Internet Routing Registry (IRR) entry for your prefix. You need to create/update an IRR entry that includes: the route (your prefix), origin ASN (AS13335 for Cloudflare), and source registry. Use <0>IRR Explorer</0> to verify your entries.
byoip.add_prefix.error.invalid_network_c: The CIDR notation you provided is invalid. This could mean the IP address format is wrong, the subnet mask is invalid, or the combination doesn't represent a valid network block.
byoip.add_prefix.success_toast: IP prefix {prefix} has been registered. Please give up to 10 minutes for Cloudflare to validate it.
byoip.ip_prefixes.empty_state.title: You have no IP prefixes yet.
byoip.ip_prefixes.header_tooltip.adverti: Configure the Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) advertisement at the Cloudflare edge.
byoip.ip_prefixes.header_tooltip.service: Determine which Cloudflare product(s) will receive traffic destined to IP addresses in this prefix.
byoip.ip_prefixes.header_tooltip.subnets: Portions of the addressing space in the parent prefix. Subnets have their own default service binding and can be advertised independently of the parent prefix down to a /24.
byoip.ip_prefixes.header_tooltip.delegat: Number of delegations on this prefix.
byoip.ip_prefixes.tooltip.pending_valida: Cloudflare is validating this IP prefix.
byoip.ip_prefixes.tooltip.invalid_valida: Cloudflare could not verify this IP prefix. Confirm your IP prefix and ASN to validate this prefix.
byoip.ip_prefixes.tooltip.ad_status_pend: This prefix cannot be advertised until it is validated and the default service is deployed.
byoip.ip_prefixes.tooltip.ad_status_adve: This prefix is advertised and available to receive traffic through Cloudflare.
byoip.ip_prefixes.tooltip.ad_status_part: This prefix is withdrawn; select subnets are advertised and available to receive traffic through Cloudflare.
byoip.ip_prefixes.tooltip.ad_status_with: This prefix is withdrawn and cannot receive traffic through Cloudflare.
byoip.ip_prefixes.tooltip.service_deploy: Cloudflare is deploying this service to our edge. Please allow up to 5 hours to complete.
byoip.ip_prefixes.delete_modal.title: Delete prefix %{cidr}?
byoip.ip_prefixes.delete_modal.descripti: You cannot undo this action. Deleting an IP prefix from Cloudflare will also delete any associated subnets.
byoip.ip_prefixes.advertise_modal.title: Advertise IP prefix %{cidr}?
byoip.ip_prefixes.advertise_modal.descri: Advertising this IP prefix will allow Cloudflare to receive traffic. If subnet(s) within this prefix are currently withdrawn, they will be considered advertised.
byoip.ip_prefixes.withdraw_modal.title: Withdraw IP prefix %{cidr}?
byoip.ip_prefixes.withdraw_modal.descrip: Withdrawing this IP prefix will stop traffic from reaching Cloudflare. If subnet(s) within this prefix are advertised, they will continue to receive traffic.
byoip.prefix_detail.subnets_section.desc: Create subnets within your IP prefix to manage Cloudflare services, advertisements, and delegations in a more granular way. Subnets smaller than a /24 cannot be independently advertised; they will inherit the advertising status of their parent. The IP Prefix advertisement status must be set to withdrawn in order to advertise individual subnets.
byoip.prefix_detail.error.not_found: IP prefix not found or you don't have permission to view it.
byoip.side_panel.details_description: View details about this IP prefix and edit its advertisement status.
byoip.side_panel.delegations_description: View and manage which accounts have been granted permission to use this IP prefix.
byoip.create_subnet.title: Create a subnet
byoip.create_subnet.page_description: Create subnets within your IP prefix to manage Cloudflare services, advertisements, and delegations in a more granular way.
byoip.create_subnet.define_subnet.title: Define your subnet
byoip.create_subnet.define_subnet.descri: Enter your subnet. Your subnet's CIDR must be contained within the parent IP prefix.
byoip.create_subnet.field.as_number_tool: The 16-bit or 32-bit integer representing the Autonomous System (AS) number associated with the client IP address. Preset to Cloudflare's ASN.
byoip.create_subnet.select_service.title: Select service binding
byoip.create_subnet.select_service.descr: Select which Cloudflare service you'd like to apply to this subnet. Cloudflare will use this service for IPs in this subnet instead of the default service on the parent IP prefix. Note: this service binding will be deployed when your subnet is created.
byoip.create_subnet.error.invalid_cidr: Please enter a valid subnet in CIDR notation (e.g. 8.31.161.0/24)
byoip.create_subnet.error.outside_parent: This address range falls outside the IP prefix.
byoip.create_subnet.error.create_failed: Failed to create subnet. Please try again.
byoip.create_subnet.success_toast: Subnet %{cidr} has been created. Please allow up to 5 hours to complete deployment.
byoip.ip_prefixes.error.delete_failed: Failed to delete prefix. Please try again.
byoip.ip_prefixes.error.advertise_failed: Failed to advertise prefix. Please try again.
byoip.ip_prefixes.error.withdraw_failed: Failed to withdraw prefix. Please try again.
byoip.ip_prefixes.error.validate_failed: Failed to validate prefix. Please try again.
byoip.ip_prefixes.error.create_service_b: Failed to create service binding. Please try again.
byoip.ip_prefixes.error.bgp_prefix_not_f: No BGP prefix found for this IP prefix. Please ensure a service binding has been configured.
